articles.content: Wireless was once the Holy Grail of festivals for UK rap fans. Reeling in overseas big shots such as Drake, Travis Scott and more, it has consistently been the UK’s best rap-curated festival for year… [+5286 chars]

articles.title: How Marie Helvin introduced Princess Diana to Dodi and found love with Camilla's brother - Daily Mail
articles.description: Marie Helvin, 69, who lives in London, told the Third Act podcast that she's struggling financially and would even consider applying for a job as a supermarket cashier.
articles.content:
She was one of the original supermodels and has told of her encounters with famous men including Marlon Brando, Warren Beatty and cricketer turned Pakistan prime minister Imran Khan.
